title: Designing Strategies to Enhance Language Learning Motivation and Teacher Support for Adult Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and possession of job-related specialized knowledge
context.additional_context: Targeting professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, the program emphasizes flexible mobile learning and developing language skills applicable to real-world tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose and analyze their motivational profiles (academic self-concept, utility value) within 72 hours

Learners can apply at least two strategies influencing motivational change—selected from teacher support sub-elements (autonomy support, learning support, instructional design, error management)—in practical settings
Learners establish personalized learning plans reflecting motivational change patterns through project-based assessments and submit implementation results as reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
